metadata.name: solmail_escrow
metadata.description: Escrow program for SolMail incentivized replies

docs: The escrow program powering SolMail's incentivized replies.

instructions.name: initialize_escrow
docs: Initialize an escrow account for a given email thread.
- `thread_id` is a 32-byte identifier derived from the email thread (e.g. a hash).
- `amount` is the number of lamports the sender wants to escrow.

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender funding the escrow.

accounts.name: escrow
docs: PDA that will hold the escrowed lamports and state.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for creating the account and transferring lamports.

instructions.name: refund_escrow
docs: Refund the escrowed funds back to the sender.
Can only be called by the sender after the 15-day expiry period.
- `thread_id` must match the one used in `initialize_escrow`.

accounts.name: sender
docs: The sender who funded the escrow (only they can refund).

accounts.name: escrow
docs: PDA holding the escrowed lamports and state.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for closing the account.

instructions.name: register_and_claim
docs: Register the receiver's wallet and claim the escrowed funds.
This is called when the receiver replies to the email thread.
- `sender_pubkey` is needed to derive the escrow PDA.
- `thread_id` must match the one used in `initialize_escrow`.

accounts.name: receiver
docs: The receiver claiming the funds.

accounts.name: escrow
docs: PDA holding the escrowed lamports and state.

accounts.name: system_program
docs: System program for closing the account.

errors.name: InvalidStatus
errors.msg: Escrow is not in a valid status for this operation

errors.name: ThreadIdMismatch
errors.msg: Thread ID does not match the escrow

errors.name: SenderMismatch
errors.msg: Sender does not match the escrow

errors.name: NotExpired
errors.msg: Escrow has not expired yet (15 days required)

types.name: Escrow
docs: Escrow account storing all data needed to manage the incentive.

fields.name: sender
docs: Wallet that funded the escrow.

fields.name: receiver
docs: Wallet that will eventually receive the funds (set on claim).

fields.name: thread_id
docs: Deterministic identifier for the email thread.

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount of lamports escrowed.

fields.name: created_at
docs: Unix timestamp when the escrow was created.

fields.name: expires_at
docs: Unix timestamp after which the sender can refund.

fields.name: status
docs: Current status of the escrow.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump.

types.name: EscrowStatus
docs: Simple status enum so we can extend behavior later.
